SELECT
FROM solarev.ocpp_charge_point_settings cps WHERE cps.cp_id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM solarev.ocpp_charge_point_settings cps ORDER BY cp_id

SELECT cp.id AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_cp_id , COALESCE(cps.created, us.created) AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_created , COALESCE(cps.pub_in, TRUE) AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_pub_in , COALESCE(cps.pub_flux, TRUE) AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_pub_flux , COALESCE(cps.source_id_tmpl, us.source_id_tmpl) AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_source_id_tmpl FROM solarev.ocpp_charge_point cp LEFT OUTER JOIN solarev.ocpp_user_settings us ON us.user_id = cp.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN solarev.ocpp_charge_point_settings cps ON cps.cp_id = cp.id WHERE cp.id = #{id} AND (us.created IS NOT NULL OR cps.created IS NOT NULL)
